Package frc.team5431.titan.core.joysticks

Class Joystick

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
        • frc.team5431.titan.core.joysticks.Joystick
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssignableJoystick, FSi6S, LogitechExtreme3D, Xbox
    public class Joystick
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
    Custom joystick class that is identical to the WPILib version except it has deadzone management

      • setDeadzone

        public void setDeadzone​(double value)
        SetDeadzone is a function that sets the joystick deadzone for both min and max
        Parameters:

      • getRawAxis

        public double getRawAxis​(int axis)
        GetRawAxis is a function that allows for you to get joystick data from the device.
        Overrides:
        getRawAxis in class edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
        Parameters:
        axis - Set the axis value, this is chosen via DriverStation or TitanUtil Enums
        Returns:
        This returns a double in the range of (-1, 1)
